channel.title: Posts on Anna-Lena Popkes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Anna-Lena Popkes

item.title: My path to machine learning
item.description: My enthusiasm for machine learning arose from my fascination for the human brain. I have been fascinated by the complexity of the human brain for most of my life. Consequently, I decided to study cognitive science in Osnabr√ºck, Germany. After attending a machine learning class in my fourth semester I discovered my true passion: The study and delevopment of algorithms that can learn on their own, developing a sense of intelligence.

item.title: Personal news
item.description: 2023 2023-11-01 I was invited to the podcast “Talk Python to Me” to talk about environment management and packaging. Check out the episode here. 2023-10-06 I was invited to the German “Python Podcast” to talk about environment management and packaging. Check out the episode here. 2023-07-19 I presented an updated version of the talk “An unbiased evaluation of environment management and packaging tools” at EuroPython in Prague. Check out the YouTube recording.
